title: 368. Where Do Good Ideas Come From?
description: Whether you’re mapping the universe, hosting a late-night talk show, or running a meeting, there are a lot of ways to up your idea game. Plus: the truth about brainstorming. (Ep. 3 of the “How to Be Creative” series.)
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
